source.44471ceb:
# Lightgbm - a very minimalistic notebook

The idea behind this notebook is to make a super simple base for beginners, and demonstrating the power of Lightgbm.

PS. You may fork the notebook and compare the score and the runtime of lightgbm with, say, random forest regressor.


> Don't forget to upvote if you like the length of the notebook.
